data.fullContent: Oberlin College is a private liberal arts college in Oberlin, Ohio. It was the first college in the United States to accept African-American students as well as female students. It is also known for the Oberlin Conservatory of Music. Oberlin is a member of the Great Lakes Colleges Association and the Five Colleges of Ohio consortium.
data.answer: 奥柏林学院是俄亥俄州奥柏林的一所私立文科学院。它是美国第一所既接受女学生又接受非裔美国学生的大学。它还以欧柏林音乐学院而闻名。欧柏林是五大湖学院协会和俄亥俄五所学院联盟的成员。
